game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find and retrieve the fabled Star Crystal from the lost city of Eldarath.
game.description: Legend has it that the ancient Eldarians possessed technology beyond our understanding. The Star Crystal is said to hold the key to unlocking their secrets.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a +2 magic sword, and a rare potion

tasks.objective: Reach the lost city of Eldarath
tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous Mountain Pass and find the entrance to the lost city.
tasks.location: The Mountain Pass, north of Dragon's Spine

tasks.description: Solve the ancient puzzle to unlock the crystal chamber and claim the Star Crystal.
